duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordination and movement of materials within and between factories, processing departments, and other areas.
Packaging, labeling, and stocking product for shipment.
Accepting, verifying, and recording of incoming materials from outside vendors and purchased parts.
Operating forklift and other material handling equipment to receive, load and transport material.
Accurately inputting data into computer systems to record movement of materials.
Demonstrating knowledge of and commitment to lean manufacturing principles and techniques.
Ensuring that all work activities are performed in accordance with established safety and environmental standards.
Maintaining full compliance and conducting all activities in accordance with Company policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Prior experience in an industrial environment
